title: opl finals trivia prize winners
body: So on the day of the opl finals at luna park, there was a trivia competition in the community hall. the competition was a celebrity heads kinda thing but with champions. The winners of the competition were awarded with a prize that riot said they would send to their mail. I was one of those winners and was wondering if the gift is being sent at all and if it is , when will it arrive and what is it ?!!?!?. p.s. a rioter there said it would arrive in a week so yeh. THANK YOUUUUUUUU
